title: How much is it worth it to buy an iPhone 12 Pro? I have a 6s Plus bought in the year 2016, July. - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are upgrading from 6s plus then iphone 12 Pro is a worthy product and a much bigger upgrade over your existing iphone 6s Plus, because of it's modern design, a better and a large display in small dimensions when compared with iphone 6s plus, a lot more improved triple camera setup with a lidar scanner when compared with iphone 6s Plus's single camera setup, a much more powerful A14 bionic chipset, Fast charging capability etc. So ya iphone 12 Pro is a worthy product and you will not regret purchasing it. I hope it helps. Thank you, peace ✌️.
